parameters.name: InternetSwitch
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the strict mode for the access control policy. Valid values:

*   **on**: enables the strict mode.
*   **off**: disables the strict mode.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The natural language of the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
